alert.note: Alert for Osborne; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 3:28PM CDT until May 12 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Rooks County in north central Kansas... Western Osborne County in north central Kansas... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 328 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Codell, or 11 miles north of Emmeram, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Codell around 340 PM CDT. Natoma around 345 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Woodston and Alton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
